name: Jon Hadley
body:
17 years experience, most recently at [Positive](http://positivestudio.co.uk), [Sift Digital](http://www.siftdigital.co.uk) & [Aardman Animations](http://www.aardman.com/). Enthusiastic conference attendee and hacker from Dublin to Tokyo.

Man of science, more or less agog.

Drupal, Python & Ruby on Rails. HTML, SASS & JavaScript. WCAG & BS8878.

[Twitter](http://twitter.com/mint5auce) | [LinkedIn](http://uk.linkedin.com/in/jonhadley/) | [GitHub](https://github.com/mint5auce) | [Drupal.org](https://drupal.org/u/mint5auce) | [Amazon Wish List](http://www.amazon.co.uk/registry/wishlist/36N9RPCC0L6C3)
